name: Princess Castle Quest Demo
description:
Once upon a time, there was a princess that dreamed of having her own castle. Unfortunately she got kicked out of her fathers palace and now needs to find her way in the world. Embark as a princess on an adventure into a world littered with riches and treacherous dungeons. Armed only with your wits and determination, find a way to make your dreams come true.

The Demo includes 20 puzzles pulled from the main game in a easy to navigate Demo Level as well as the first Adventure Level. It also has support for the built-in level editor and the ability to play user made levels so you can test out all of the features that the game has to offer completely free. The Demo will be updated periodically as the game gets new features so don't forget to check back here often to see new features. If you like the demo and want to play the main game while it's being developed you can purchase the game through Steam by clicking Here.



  • Explore a world filled with treasures, traps and trouble
  • Find secret passages and Easter Eggs
  • Earn yourself a castle
  • Do it all with a friend through local drop-in co-op, or play levels specifically designed for 2 players
  • Explore at your own pace with no time limits, or try to beat your best time in speedrunning mode


  • Unlock puzzle packs using the loot you obtain from Adventure Mode
  • Dive deep into the mechanics with a variety of clever and crazy levels
  • 20 Puzzles plus the first Adventure Mode level


  • Take your experience into your own hands with the fully featured level editor included in the game
  • Explore your own ideas and discover the limitless ways to combine the mechanics
  • Share levels with your friends and play community created content.
  • Be a part of the Early Access process and send us an email or feedback ticket and your suggestions could be be added to the game!

The full game not finished yet but we are working very hard on it and adding features all the time. Early Access is a way for people to buy the game now at a cheaper price and play it while it's being developed. If you want to play the game now you can buy it through Steam by following the link below and you will automatically get all future versions of the game as they come out. 

If you haven't heard of Early Access before or have some questions about how to get the game you can read our FAQ by following the link below or email us your questions at PrincessCastleQuest@gmail.com

https://www.PrincessCastleQuest.com/faq

If you want to stay up to date on the progress of the game, talk with the developers and community, share and download user made levels, and much more you can join us on our Discord channel using the invite link below:

https://discord.gg/JQaertK
